usage.label: Product / Usage Criteria
usage.description: any product, feature, or population subset for which we wish to calculate growth metrics

values.label: Any Firefox Desktop Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'main' ping from Firefox Desktop on the day in question

values.label: New Firefox Desktop Profile Created
values.shortDescription: The count of the number of new profiles created on the day in question

values.label: Visited 5 URIs
values.shortDescription: The profile sent a main ping on the day in question that indicates that the profile opened at least 5 URIs

values.label: Opened DevTools
values.shortDescription: The profile sent a main ping on the day in question that indicates that the developer tools feature was activated at least once

values.label: Any Mobile Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry ping from any of apps considered for the 2019 Mobile Reach KPI (Fenix, Fennec Android, Fennec iOS, Firefox Lite (excluding CN), FirefoxConnect, Focus Android, Focus iOS, and Lockwise) on the day in question.

values.label: Any Fenix or Firefox Preview Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a Glean 'baseline' ping from Fenix or Firefox Preview on the day in question

values.label: Any Fenix Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a Glean 'baseline' ping from Fenix on the day in question; excludes Firefox Preview

values.label: Any Firefox Preview Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a Glean 'baseline' ping from Firefox Preview on the day in question

values.label: Any Firefox Account Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has interacted with a Firefox Account server on the day in question

values.label: Any Lockwise Android Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from Lockwise Android on the day in question

values.label: Any Fennec Android Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from Fennec Android on the day in question

values.label: Any Fennec iOS Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from Fennec iOS on the day in question

values.label: Any Focus Android Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from Focus Android on the day in question

values.label: Any Focus iOS Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from Focus iOS on the day in question

values.label: Any Firefox Lite Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from Firefox Lite on the day in question

values.label: Any Firefox for FireTV Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from Firefox for FireTV on the day in question

values.label: Any FirefoxConnect Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a telemetry 'core' ping from FirefoxConnect on the day in question

values.label: Any Reference Browser Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a Glean 'baseline' ping from Reference Browser on the day in question

values.label: Any VR Browser Activity
values.shortDescription: The profile has sent a Glean 'baseline' ping from Firefox Reality (VR Browser) on the day in question

values.label: All Available Metrics
values.shortDescription: Shows all the below metrics on one page

values.label: Daily Active Users
values.subtitle: Count of Unique Profiles
values.shortDescription: The number of unique profiles that meet the usage criterion on each day

values.label: Weekly Active Users
values.subtitle: Count of Unique Profiles
values.shortDescription: The number of unique profiles that met the usage criterion at least once during the 7-day window ending on the specified day

values.label: Monthly Active Users
values.subtitle: Count of Unique Profiles
values.shortDescription: The number of unique profiles that met the usage criterion at least once during the 28-day window ending on the specified day

values.label: Intensity
values.subtitle: Ratio of Days Used
values.shortDescription: Among profiles that meet the usage criterion at least once in the week ending on the date specified, how many days on average do they meet the usage criterion during that one-week window

values.label: 1-Week New Profile Retention
values.subtitle: Perc. Retained
values.shortDescription: Among new profiles created on the day specified, what proportion (out of 1) meet the usage criterion during the week beginning one week after the day specified

values.label: 1-Week Retention
values.subtitle: Perc. Retained (Usage Criterion Pop.)
values.shortDescription: Among profiles that were active in the specified usage criterion at least once in the week starting on the specified day, what proportion (out of 1) meet the usage criterion during the following week
